browser-action.name: read
browser-action.description:
Read the text content of an Element.
Possible parameters are: - selector (required): The selector is a string that point to the elements in the page. Several types of selector are supported: text, CSS, XPath... You can specify several selectors by adding multiple "selector" parameters to this action. The targeted element will match any of the selectors (OR operator). - variableName (optional): The variable name of the text result. - attribute (optional): If specified, returns the attribute's value instead of the text value of the selected element - timeout (optional): Forces the timeout for that action in ms. By default the OpenBrowser defaultTimeout is used. - frameIndex (optional): Frame index. Takes priority over frameName parameter. - frameName (optional): Frame name. - ignoreErrors (optional): true of false to ignore errors. Default value is "true".

custom-action-parameter.name: selector
custom-action-parameter.value: #site-content > header:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1)
